DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this 10-week study is to compare the reduction in cholesterol following treatment with two different marketed drugs, in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Cholesterol Lowering Effects of Two Marketed Products in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Hypercholesterolemia (MK-0653A-077)
DOC.criteria: Men and women aged 18 to 79 years who have a confirmed diagnosis of type 2 diabetes mellitus with elevated cholesterol levels may be eligible to participate in a study to assess the efficacy and safety of the two marketed drugs. Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus that is poorly controlled
